summary: I am a legal professional and (part-time) academic with 15 years of experience in European and international law. Passionate about promoting justice, human rights, and transparency. Interested in EU politics, artificial intelligence and creative writing. Eager to engage with fellow professionals and experts in law, policy, and technology to drive positive change and shape our rapidly evolving global landscape.
